net.hudup.core.data

Interface ExternalQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Alg, AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExternalQuery

    public interface ExternalQuery
extends AutoCloseable, Alg
    Alg is the most abstract interface for all algorithms. Alg is one of the most important interfaces. It declares the most basic methods in an algorithm. The most important thing is that every Alg owns a configuration specified by DataConfig class. Alg has five typical inherited interfaces as follows:
    • Recommendation algorithm Recommender.
    • Context template schema manager CTSManager.
    • Data set parser DatasetParser.
    • External query ExternalQuery.
    • Metric Metric.
    Therefore, this class is also an algorithm and it is discovered and registered in plug-in storage by plug-in manager. External query is mainly used to retrieve external information stored in outside database different from Hudup database. In current implementation, external query retrieve (queries) external information about user and item specified by ExternalUserInfo and ExternalItemInfo, respectively. Moreover, external query can fill in Hudup database by importing data from outside database.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        boolean setup(DataConfig internalConfig,
              ExternalConfig externalConfig)
        Setting up (initializing) this external query by both internal configuration and external configuration.
        Parameters:
        internalConfig - internal configuration to describe Hudup database.
        externalConfig - external configuration to describe outside database.
        Returns:
        whether setting up successfully.

      • getItemInfo

        ExternalItemInfo getItemInfo(int itemId)
        Getting external item information from internal item identifier.
        Parameters:
        itemId - internal item id.
        Returns:
        ExternalItemInfo stored in outside database.

      • getUserInfo

        ExternalUserInfo getUserInfo(int userId)
        Getting external user information from internal user identifier.
        Parameters:
        userId - internal user id.
        Returns:
        ExternalUserInfo stored in outside database.

      • importData

        void importData(ProgressListener registeredListener)
        Fill in Hudup database by importing data from outside (external database) database. The Hudup database (internal database) is described by internal configuration mentioned in setup(DataConfig, ExternalConfig). The outside database (external database) is described by external configuration mentioned in setup(DataConfig, ExternalConfig).
        Parameters:
        registeredListener - the registered ProgressListener to observe the importing process. This listener can do some particular tasks such as showing the progress bar so that users know the progress of importing process.
